title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: Break down a problem into its most basic components. Otherwise, you may grow distracted by too many moving parts at work in the elusive enigma. A flood of concerns about everything that could go wrong might run loose in your thoughts today. Luckily, you can influence the situation to assure sure that more goes right. Meditation helps to clear your mind, but so would a harmless distraction like tuning into your favorite song or indulging in a power nap. A mental reset allows your intuition to pierce through any brain fog like a beacon from a brightly shining lighthouse. Bruce Lee said, Simplicity is the key to brilliance. Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
